statements.select: SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_events_ddzc where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresName='152' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate#)
statements.insert: INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_ddzc ( EveddzcId, EveresId, DdzcType, HospId, HospDepId, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientSex, PatientAge, PatientAgeUnit, NursLevel, Diagnosis, IsEvaluate, EvaluateScore, EvaluateDate, IsTakePrevent, DzPlace, DzState, MentalState, SelfcareState, DzHazards, DzHazardsQt, DzHistory, UseDrug, GroundState, IndoorState, EscortState, DzHurtState, DzHurtPosition, DzHurtArea, DzHandle, DzHandleQt, EventDescription, EventLevel, StaffType, StaffTypeQt, StaffPosition, StaffEducation, StaffEduQt, StaffWorkyears, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID, Degreeinjury, Restrain, BedColumnUse, DzPlaceQt, DzStateQt, MentalStateQt, UseDrugQt ) VALUES ( #EveddzcId#, #EveresId#, #DdzcType#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientSex#, #PatientAge#, #PatientAgeUnit#, #NursLevel#, #Diagnosis#, #IsEvaluate#, #EvaluateScore#, #EvaluateDate#, #IsTakePrevent#, #DzPlace#, #DzState#, #MentalState#, #SelfcareState#, #DzHazards#, #DzHazardsQt#, #DzHistory#, #UseDrug#, #GroundState#, #IndoorState#, #EscortState#, #DzHurtState#, #DzHurtPosition#, #DzHurtArea#, #DzHandle#, #DzHandleQt#, #EventDescription#, #EventLevel#, #StaffType#, #StaffTypeQt#, #StaffPosition#, #StaffEducation#, #StaffEduQt#, #StaffWorkyears#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID#, #Degreeinjury#, #Restrain#, #BedColumnUse#, #DzPlaceQt#, #DzStateQt#, #MentalStateQt#, #UseDrugQt# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_ddzc SET EveddzcId = #EveddzcId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, DdzcType = #DdzcType#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientSex = #PatientSex#, PatientAge = #PatientAge#, PatientAgeUnit=#PatientAgeUnit#, NursLevel = #NursLevel#, Diagnosis = #Diagnosis#, IsEvaluate = #IsEvaluate#, EvaluateScore = #EvaluateScore#, EvaluateDate = #EvaluateDate#, IsTakePrevent = #IsTakePrevent#, DzPlace = #DzPlace#, DzState = #DzState#, MentalState = #MentalState#, SelfcareState = #SelfcareState#, DzHazards = #DzHazards#, DzHazardsQt = #DzHazardsQt#, DzHistory = #DzHistory#, UseDrug = #UseDrug#, GroundState = #GroundState#, IndoorState = #IndoorState#, EscortState = #EscortState#, DzHurtState = #DzHurtState#, DzHurtPosition = #DzHurtPosition#, DzHurtArea = #DzHurtArea#, DzHandle = #DzHandle#, DzHandleQt = #DzHandleQt#, EventDescription = #EventDescription#, EventLevel = #EventLevel#, StaffType = #StaffType#, StaffTypeQt = #StaffTypeQt#, StaffPosition = #StaffPosition#, StaffEducation = #StaffEducation#, StaffEduQt = #StaffEduQt#, StaffWorkyears = #StaffWorkyears#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID#, Degreeinjury=#Degreeinjury#, Restrain=#Restrain#, BedColumnUse=#BedColumnUse#, DzPlaceQt=#DzPlaceQt#, DzStateQt=#DzStateQt#, MentalStateQt=#MentalStateQt#, UseDrugQt=#UseDrugQt# WHERE (EveddzcId = #EveddzcId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_ddzc SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
